reviewText: Excellent series with in-depth first person interviews. Highly Recommended!!!!!

colourful opening sequence with footage of zululand.followed by detailed history of zulu land from shakka,to the rising of cetswayo and his dealings with the boers and british.excellent special comments from ian knight,ian castle and john laband.maps showing the layout of southern africa,many b&w photographs and video footage of the original sites used as a backdrop to the narration,also interspersed with sepia footage used for re-enactments.the use of personnal diaries also a big plus.finishes with the announcement of the demise of the british camp at isandlwana.this dvd is well worth a look.
